info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 3:07PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Iron County through 345 PM MDT... At 306 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles northwest of Enoch, or 27 miles northwest of Cedar City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lund. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
